backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, replies, and access control with permission checks and default reply handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_RETRY_NOTES.md: Deployment retry notes detailing assets, build steps, and expected app behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and global theming for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling navigation between landing, overlay, gratitude, reply, and farewell pages.
Button component that dodges user interaction and shows a temporary warning popup.
frontend/src/components/RomanticNotifica: Full-screen romantic overlay with animated hearts, sparkles, and dismiss button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated/anonymous backend actors with access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplyPersistence.t: Uses react-query and an actor to load and save a user's reply, exposing loading, saving, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config defining Valentine-themed colors, animations, gradients, and component styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/FarewellPage.tsx: Displays a farewell message with animated emojis, themed styling, and a footer credit link.
frontend/src/pages/GratitudePage.tsx: Shows a gratitude-themed page with animated hearts, decorative visuals, and a next-step button callback.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders a Valentine-themed landing screen with animated hearts and a yes/no prompt using an evasive 'No' button.
frontend/src/pages/ReplyPage.tsx: A React page showing a reply textarea with in-place editing, saving via a persistence hook, and a Next button for navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, pending requests, and overall app flow.
